name: FAISS Minimal (Python)
description: Create a FAISS index, add vectors, and run a search.

files.template:
import faiss, numpy as np
x = np.array([[0.1,0.2,0.3],[0.2,0.1,0.25]], dtype='float32')
index = faiss.IndexFlatL2(3)
index.add(x)
D,I = index.search(np.array([[0.1,0.2,0.3]], dtype='float32'), 2)
print(I.tolist())
